message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable item. I'm willing to part with it for $20000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we meet at $16000?
